traits.name: Stalk-still
traits.desc: A myconid that remains perfectly still has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide.

actions.name: Stone Knuckles
actions.desc: Melee weapon attack: +7 to hit. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Spore Bomb
actions.desc: Ranged weapon attack: +8 to hit, range 30/60 ft. Hit: 15 (6d4) poison damage and the target must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or drop to 0 hit points.
